guia.usos: >@<|mention a user, >ID<|ID of a user, >num_pagina<|the rank page
guia.funcao: The member's level ranking on the server, active members have more experience and therefore are more prominent in the ranking; sometimes the rating can grant up to 5x XP for each message
Confirm whether a user is cattle or not
Shows the level of affinity between two people
Send a greeting to baidu in the chat

guia.usos: eight and seven|makes alonsal say "eight-seven" with TTS in the chat, >FILE<|re-sends the file sent by the user
guia.funcao: Alonsal will speak in TTS or send files with this command
Alonsal will tell a random curiosity (only in Portuguese)
Alonsal will tell a random joke (only in Portuguese)
It will make your text stylish
See your ping and Alonsal's ping

guia.usos: >your_text<|code your text in morse, >your_morse<|decode your text from morse, rev >your_text<|(De)codes your text/morse and even reverses the character order
guia.funcao: Encode and decode whatever you want to/from Morse

guia.usos: >your_text<|encodes your text to binary, >your_binary<|decode your text from binary, rev >your_text<|(De)codes your text/binary and even reverses the character order
guia.funcao: Encodes and decodes what you input to/from the binary
Inverts and uninverts the entered text

guia.usos: >key< >your_text<|encrypt your text with the entered key, >key< >encrypted_text<|decrypts the text with the given key
guia.funcao: Encrypt and decrypt the text entered with a key
Search what is informed on wikipedia, the language of wikipedia and its content is defined based on the language of Alonsal.

guia.usos: >some_location<|Shows the current time in some searched location, los angeles|Shows the weather in Los Angeles, l#o5s an0g%$eles|Shows the weather in Los Angeles, "Saint-Louis-du-Ha! Ha!"|Show the weather in Saint-Louis-du-Ha! Ha! without disregarding the entered characters
guia.funcao: Show current time and lots of other information somewhere, search using "quotes" to not skip any characters

guia.usos: |show any event today, 01-21 |show some random event on January 21st
guia.funcao: Displays events by history on the date informed, can show the current day and any other date, creating lists with all in one day or not (only in Portuguese)
Increases the emoji entered (only works with custom emojis from the server)

guia.usos: |show your avatar, >@<|show the avatar of the mentioned user, >ID<|show avatar based on user id
guia.funcao: Show your or a user's avatar
Shows the icon of the server where you used the command, you can save the image
